description: "This map shows the route of the first Dutch expedition to Southeast Asia in 1595-7. Led by Cornelis de Houtman, it was an attempt to enter the spice trade. The route crosses east over the Indian Ocean, circles the island of Java, and returns west."
title: "Descriptio hydrographica accommodata ad battavorum navagatione in Javam insulam Indie Orientalis, seatum ad quam postridie calendas Aprilis anno 1595 ex Hollandia solverunt et ex qua domum redierunt idus Augusti anno 1597 horum extus reditusq via his notis demonstratur de hac navigatione extat descriptio lectu perquam admiranda"
